name: Unctrlable
description:
You're on a Spaceship.

You gotta steer it so you don't crash into the world.

W A S D to move

J and L to control the Ship's orientation in the cockpit terminal

Data Terminal status determines ability to maintain orientation

Engine status determines change of velocity

Good luck!

Credits:

Sergio M did Music, Character Animation

Eric W did pretty much all the Art

Chris G was code munkee

Markus G was chief editor

Michael Q made the cowboy cover art
